we-dont-store-it.zh: 使用远程打包服务时，签名证书文件的副本将临时传输到用于打包的远程服务器，并在打包完成后立即自动删除。[b]C3或Scirra公司不会储存任何由远程打包服务使用或生成的证书文件[/b]。因此，[b]您必须自行保管证书文件储存在安全的地方。[/b]
we-dont-store-it.en: When using the build service a copy of your keystore will be transferred to the build server temporarily, and deleted once the build has completed. [b]Neither C3 or Scirra hold a copy of any keystore[/b] created or used by the build service. [b]You must keep your keystore in a safe and secure place.[/b]

google-play-app-signing.zh: 如果您担心可能会丢失签名证书的密钥，可以使用 Google Play 应用签名服务。这将会使用 2 个密钥而不是 1 个；上传密钥和签名密钥。当使用这项服务时，应用商店会验证您用来上传游戏的密钥，然后通过Google 安全存储服务对签名密钥进行二次签名。如果你丢失了上传密钥，或该密钥被盗用，可以联系 Google 撤销旧的上传密钥并重新生成新的。由于你的应用签名密钥受 Google 保护，即使更改了上传密钥，您也可以继续提交应用的新版本作为原始应用更新。
google-play-app-signing.en: If you are worried about the possibility of losing your signing key, you can use Google Play App Signing. This makes use of 2 keys instead of 1; an upload key and a signing key. When you use this service the Play Store verifies the key you used to sign your game for upload, then it signs it a second time with the signing key that Google stores securely. If you lose your upload key, or if it is compromised, you can contact Google to revoke your old upload key and generate a new one. Because your app signing key is secured by Google, you can continue to upload new versions of your app as updates to the original app, even if you change upload keys.

more-information.zh: 你可以在此了解更多关于安卓应用程序签名的事项：
more-information.en: You can find more information about signing Android applications at:

signature.zh: 你的 SHA-1 签名证书是 [b]{0}[/b]。您需要立即保存下来，因为后续需要在 Google Play 等插件或平台中使用它。
signature.en: Your SHA-1 signature is [b]{0}[/b]. It's worth writing this down, as you will need it to use some plugins like Google Play.
